data.oai_dc:dc: Individual Microsatellite Genotypes and Geographic Coordinates

First column represents unique individual identifier with population abbreviation. WA=White Oak 2013, WB=White Oak 2014, WO=White Oak 2015, see paper for additional abbreviations. Individuals whose identifier ends with a letter are females who were attracted to the male with the same number without the letter suffix (for example, LL-10A is the first female who was attracted to male LL-10). Column headings show the name of the loci/marker used.
